reviews.review:
I don't know how many times I've raged and spouted some... bad language at my teammates.
But it never gets old.

My no-life 1k hours should tell you this.
Хорошая игра, что нельзя сказать об античите!
This game ruined my life, in a good way.
Amaizing game just get it its on sale.Its worth it.

WTF CAN U FUCKING FIX IT, I HAVE 15 COLLETION PINS AND SERVER WILL FIND OUT PPL WHO HAVE 200 H AND 2 PINS WTF AND I SPENT 7 DAYS AT TRY TO REACH SUPREME AND WHEN I REACH IT I MUST HAVE IN 4 GAMES CHEATERSIO
Super gra tylko niech naprawią hitboxy i zrobią Polskie serwery jako oficjalne.
I don‘t know wether i‘ve wasted more money or time loving and hating this game - but it was worth it anyways
all'inizio sembrava un gioco bello ma dopo sono stato bannato  solo perche ho ucciso un tipo nella smoke gioco non consigliato!
O servidor está o pior possivel, sempre cai mesmo com a conexão em perfeito estado. Muito lag e muito drop fps e drop conexão

CS:GO is a great, fast-paced tactical FPS and it's good once you get prime. If you dont you will probz be faced up with hackers unfortunately because VAC is a joke cyka but apart from that, it is a great game more or less even though there are a few bugs still remaining.
it's so cool.very good game.i like it

这游戏，当作免费测试工具，或者偶尔打打人机自娱自乐就行
联网对战就别玩了，不说软件的外挂了，购物平台上各种易键鼠啊那一类的硬件外挂十多块钱一套每月几万几万的销量，可以说遍地都是挂，无挂不游戏的程度了
原来还下练习图来天天打bot练枪法，现在还不如别人十多块钱买个硬件压枪转换器，被各种飘到天上的枪随便一套带走，可以说是真的小丑竟然是我自己了
Oyun güzel arkadaş ortamınız varsa daha da güzel
its a shit game and its filled with hackers
Классная игра, но очень много читеров! Которые очень жаде палятся и Valve их не блокирует зачастую!

best competitive game there is out today ! 10/10 ! 
I dont recommend spending money on skins, it doesn't improve the game at all.
cnm，锁几次饰品，欺骗中国玩家感情吗

Гавное какое-то!
Читеров дохера , нервов не хватает!
Не надо в это играть.
Put way too much time into this phenominally good game, lots of fun to play with friends, stay away from matchmaking use ESEA or FaceIt for a more competitive experience.
